alert.note: Alert for Faulk (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 3:14PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Faulk County through 445 PM CDT... At 414 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Evergreen Colony, or 7 miles northeast of Faulkton, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cresbard around 430 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Devoe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
